mapper.select: SELECT j.book_num, j.book_img, j.product_sales FROM(SELECT i.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM(SELECT b.book_num, book_img, book_name, product_sales FROM book b, product p WHERE b.book_num = p.book_num ORDER BY product_sales DESC)i)j WHERE j.rnum >= 1 AND j.rnum <= 5
